s1 =

    0.8950   -0.4418   -0.0613
    0.4366    0.8959   -0.0821
    0.0912    0.0468    0.9947

>> s2 = [0.838742 -0.478913 -0.259141;
0.451911 0.877706 -0.159403;
0.303790 0.016589 0.952594]

s2 =

    0.8387   -0.4789   -0.2591
    0.4519    0.8777   -0.1594
    0.3038    0.0166    0.9526

>> s = s1 * inv(s2)

s =

    0.9781    0.0265    0.2062
   -0.0416    0.9967    0.0692
   -0.2037   -0.0763    0.9761

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(s)

r =

   -0.3306    0.9310   -0.1548    0.2220

>> c = [0.99832815, -0.057722233, 0.0030147887;
 0.057406217, 0.98407656, -0.1682196;
 0.006743229, 0.16811144, 0.98574495]

c =

    0.9983   -0.0577    0.0030
    0.0574    0.9841   -0.1682
    0.0067    0.1681    0.9857

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(c)

r =

    0.9461   -0.0105    0.3238    0.1787
